Author: CraftR_Dev
Title: [ANN] CraftR(CRAFTR) POS+Escrow - Asset Store & Freelance P2P Marketplace
Body: Hard Cap raised! We have finally reached our goal through a co-investment partnership with LeadRex Corporation. A company that's targeting to an advertising platform based on AI.  TOKEN SALE Period: 15 July - 30 Nov 2018 Sold: 8.000.000 CraftR Raised: 2000 ETH (10.000.000 ATL & 833.333 REO)  PRIVATE SALE Period: 4 December 2018 Sold: 12.000.000 CraftR Raised: 3255 ETH (3.389.831 LDXT)  Our next step is to proceed with solving legal issues, in order to: - list CraftR on exchanges (ex: LA Token); - cooperate with third party services (ex: Bounty distribution).[/size]

Author: CraftR_Dev
Title: [ANN] CraftR(CRAFTR) POS+Escrow - Asset Store & Freelance P2P Marketplace
Body: SWAP Announcement  Dear community, we inform you that we processed a swap of CraftR (CRAFTR) token. Check your new tokens by adding this CONTRACT ADDRESS 0x2ab22d3f1205b9f523ebe80ae2853f7644830760 to your wallets. The only change you need to consider is the contract address and tokens have been already distributed to holders. This change was taken afterwards a contract improvement which fixed some minor bugs and the compatibility with a more recent version of Solidity compiler. Furthermore there is a new advantage: POS execution will require 60% less gas.  Token parameters to add in your wallet: - 0x2ab22d3f1205b9f523ebe80ae2853f7644830760 as Contract Address - CraftR (CRAFTR) as Name(Ticker) - 18 decimals[/size]

Author: CraftR_Dev
Title: [ANN] CraftR(CRAFTR) POS+Escrow - Asset Store & Freelance P2P Marketplace
Body: SWAP-2 ANNOUNCEMENT  Dear community, had to be done. Another swap has been processed and higher security measures have been applied regarding the token management. This action will prevent a possible token price damage in the near future.  All holders except those 'locked' have already received their respective amount into their wallets.  DO NOT SEND new tokens to exchanges until we publish updates regarding new listing.  New Contract Address: 0x2784dCd08F4B1Bb25AF84fD0b702E2Aa5D5d1D64 Ticker: CRAFTR Decimals: 18

Author: CraftR_Dev
Title: [ANN] CraftR(CRAFTR) POS+Escrow - Asset Store & Freelance P2P Marketplace
Body: Our strategy will be adopted only after the release of the functional marketplace that's almost ready. To be more precise, we will work on promotion at various levels by targeting to social networks related to freelancers, and massive digital advertising to allow our marketplace to appear among the top result in search engines.  To allow this, social networks will give a good opportunity to spread the word. After a premature analysis, we found some social media platform that proliferate of artists ready to sell their creations. Some example are Instagram, Pinterest, Facebook groups, Youtube, and Twitter.

Author: CraftR_Dev
Title: [ANN] CraftR(CRAFTR) POS+Escrow - Asset Store & Freelance P2P Marketplace
Body: To our awesome community  KuCoin is organizing a Vote For Your Coin action on telegram, we can let the voice of our community be heard. If we get the most votes we will be awarded with a FREE KuCoin listing and a 30,000 USD marketing package to go with it.  Let’s all get together now and make sure this project gets some well deserved exposure!  We are going to pay you 100+ more CraftR tokens for your precious support. Check the airdrop & bounty page. Also enjoy the possibility to earn tokens by registering to our marketplace and through the referral system!  Competition Rules  KuCoin has a dedicated group of admins and bots to monitor and go through all the collected data. Do not cheat and make sure you follow the rules carefully if you want your vote to count.  Do not vote for the same project twice. You can vote for multiple projects but do not repeat the same project, our voting system wont allow that.  Don’t spam, remain polite and listen to the admins. Offenders will be banned and votes revoked.  How To Vote  If you haven’t done so, make sure you sign-up on KuCoin. You need to be registered on KuCoin in order for your vote to count.  Join the competition’s telegram channel: t.me/KuCoin_Telegram_Competition  Follow the instructions in the pinned post. Most of the voting system is automated so things will be super easy for you.  Make sure you READ THE PINNED POST so you know what to expect, you will have to start a private conversation with our voting bot, it will take care of the rest!  Fill the fields our bot sends you in the private chat, you will be asked the following:  a. What is Your KuCoin Account Email Address:  b. Project Name You Want To Get Listed (spell the name in full, DON'T USE THE TICKER): CraftR  c. What Is Special About This Project, Why Should It Be Listed On The Exchange:  **Competition starts when voting bot goes live on July 12th 18.00 UTC+8 and run until July 15th 18.00 UTC+8.

Author: CraftR_Dev
Title: [ANN] CraftR(CRAFTR) POS+Escrow - Asset Store & Freelance P2P Marketplace
Body: Partner of &  Welcome to CraftR  CraftR is a decentralized platform based in Switzerland and it’s aimed at buying and selling digital creative assets & services among users. Our P2P marketplace will be a good place for freelancers and developers that will have the opportunity to get involved in a new form of global e-commerce based on blockchain technology. Through the platform, we want to give an additional opportunity to generate online financial revenues. It is well known that automation will drastically reduce the availability of jobs in the near future and a good solution would be to adapt to changing events, opting for new solutions via Internet and the own amateur/professional skills. We are focusing on different types of professions and this could also be a good opportunity to push new people to use the blockchain. Everyone will be able to sell freelancing services or offer self-made creative assets to consumers that will be looking for a missing piece to proceed in a project development or to acquire new skills. There will be also the opportunity to participate in events with consequent prizes in tokens, such as competitions, bounties, and the referral program. CraftR marketplace will be represented by zero-commissions for all transaction made through the cryptocurrency payment system that will allow users to have a total finance control and the possibility to buy products & services without our/third-party interferences. In the long term, we plan to bring the store into a virtual form, the VR (Virtual Reality). This latest generation technology will allow us to create an ideal virtual store for digital creative products. Another milestone is the release of a multipurpose IDE for developers, allowing users to create and publish creative assets directly inside CraftR system. As long as the store is not released, interested parties will be able to generate extra tokens through the Proof-Of-Stake (POS) phase.           What you will find on CraftR marketplace:  Web Templates & UX-UI components | Scripts | 2D/3D Art | Video-Motion Design | Sounds & Tracks | Complete Projects (Mobile & Web) Freelance Job Services developing  Features  Storage of a wide choice of digital creative assets | Freelance Job Services | CRAFTR decentralized payment system (zero-fees and commissions) Removal of intermediary | Reward & Referral system | Built-in storage facility | Ranking system | Advertising features [/size]

Author: sjyi
Title: [ANN] CraftR(CRAFTR) POS+Escrow - Asset Store & Freelance P2P Marketplace
Body: First, your link to whitepaper doesn't work.  Your website's link works though.  So your system allows people to buy and sell various software IP through your exchange using your token?  So this is a software market place, but need to use your token to participate? Or is this a market place for sw development tools?  If so, I like the concept, but you're missing so much details.  It would help people understand the project goal better if more details are provided rather than simply listing what appears to file types.

Author: CraftR_Dev
Title: [ANN] CraftR(CRAFTR) POS+Escrow - Asset Store & Freelance P2P Marketplace
Body: Hi sjyi,  Thank you for notify about the wrong link. It's working now.  The marketplace will allow people to buy or sell creative assets, such as scripts, ui components, templates, fonts, illustrations, 2d / 3d objects, video-editing components, and sounds. The products will help anyone to complete an idea or learn new skills through the provision of freelancers who will be able to exhibit their products.  The final goal of the buyers that reach our marketplace is to find the missing piece to produce software, applications, video games, websites, movies, audio tracks, documents, or illustrations.  Regarding the payment method, customers will have to use CRAFTR token as the only constraint to obtain products for sale. While sellers will enjoy the opportunity to earn them.
